extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of third year standing or above

basic.description:
Painting and sculpture in the period following the High Renaissance will be examined, with emphasis placed on the emergence and meaning of mannerism in Florence and Rome.
RECOMMENDATION    ARTH 214/3.0 and 215/3.0 (or ARTH 213/6.0).
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: Mannerism
